00014     class Storage
00015     {
00016     public:
00017         static void save(Net& obj, std::string filename)
00018         {
00019             std::ofstream ofs(filename.c_str());
00020             if(ofs.fail())
00021                 throw Exception::FilesystemError()<<"Storage::save(): failed to open file "<<filename<<" for writing\n"; 
00022 
00023             std::cout<<"Saving net to "<<filename<<"..."<<std::endl;
00024             boost::archive::text_oarchive oa(ofs);
00025             oa << obj;
00026             std::cout<<"\n\n";
00027 
00028             ofs.close();
00029         };
00030 
00031         static void load(Net& obj, std::string filename)
00032         {
00033             std::ifstream ifs(filename.c_str());
00034             if(ifs.fail())
00035                 throw Exception::FilesystemError()<<"Storage::load(): failed to open file "<<filename<<" for reading\n"; 
00036             
00037             std::cout<<"Loading net from "<<filename<<"..."<<std::endl;
00038             boost::archive::text_iarchive ia(ifs);
00039             ia >> obj;
00040             std::cout<<"\n\n";
00041 
00042             ifs.close();
00043         };
00044     };
